about_the_game:
In Spellslayers, you control a powerful sorcerer trying to find the lost eyes of the spellslayer, the most powerful sorcerer in history. Travel to different locations and take out anyone who tries to stop you in this puzzle tactics roguelite adventure!


Each turn, you can move your character and spend energy on spells. You can have up to 4 spells equipped at a time, and each spell has its own hit pattern on the board. Once you cast your first spell you can no longer move that turn, so try to maneuvre to utilise your spells to the fullest!


All the foes you face are sorcerers as well! Each of them has their own distinct spell they cast, telegraphing where they will attack. Outmaneveure their spells and strike back with your own.


Void tiles will appear in each battle, which increases the damage you do and amplify each spell in their own way, but increase the damage you take, so weigh up the odds before stepping onto them for the turn. Be careful though, as enemies can also use these to cast their spell instantly, leading you to take damage you weren't prepared for.


Journey to the location of each eye, and fight off hordes of spellcasters. Choose which path to take next, as you discover new spells, empower old ones, enhance your body, return to your quarters to rest, visit the souls market, and eventually come face to face with other High end sorcerers, competing against you to become the Spellslayer themselves.

short_description: Take on the role of a spellcasting slayer puzzle tactics roguelite. Use a combination of clever positioning, strategic thinking and pure casting power to vanquish your enemies and claim the ultimate power source!
